content:
公司名稱，統編:泰錸科技有限公司，52301203


公司地址:台北市松山區敦化北路207號


職缺:DevOps Engineer


工作內容說明:

DevOps engineers are responsible for building the frameworks to benchmark
and tune the performance of our trading systems.

Key responsibilities include:

   -Tune Linux kernel and network infrastructure to minimize trading
    system latency
   -Building Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD)
    pipelines to automatically test and push out changes - including
    monitoring system-wide latency and other key performance metrics

The work will be challenging, fast-paced, and competitive.  Timeline
Technologies is a flat organization, where ideas flow freely throughout
the firm.  You will have the opportunity to work with smart people in a
dynamic and fast-paced environment.  A financial background is not necessary,
rather we are looking for self-motivated engineers that have applied new
technologies to solving challenging problems. This role is based in Taipei,
Taiwan


職缺能力經歷要求:

What we’re looking for

  -Expert knowledge of networking protocols (Ethernet/IP/TCP/UDP)
  -Experience tuning Linux kernel (hardware performance policy, process
   affinity, numa, tuna and schedulers)
  -Experience implementing automated hardware and software system
   performance metrics
  -Strong scripting skills


員工是否需自備工具? :否


薪資(月薪):NT$ 75,000-150,000


薪資(保證最低年薪，必填項目): 15個月


年終獎金計算方式:全薪計算


****以下工時與加班費必填，不填刪文水桶****

工時:每日工作時間: 9:00AM~6:00PM (八小時)
     中午休息(12:00~1:00)
     每周工作時間: 8*5=40


加班費制度：比照勞基法


工作環境與該職缺團隊介紹:

**鼓勵員工創造及表現**
- 靈活管理
我們尊重每個人的獨特性，也相信每個人擁有的潛力，在工作上提供高度自由的空間，
不吝給予員工創造能發揮專長的機會

- 獎勵表現
公司利潤是員工創造的，所以公司在福利及獎金制度上也不會讓表現優秀的員工失望，
我們也鼓勵並支持員工持續學習，讓公司不斷茁壯

**提供優質健康的工作環境**
- 舒適辦公設備
符合人體工學的Herman Miller辦公椅，搭配可調整高度的電動辦公桌，大幅降低身體
的負擔，讓員工能舒適地工作

- 健身房月費贊助
只要5分鐘左右的路程，就可以到達設備完善的健身房，期望員工透過規律的運動，
讓工作更有效率、身體更健康


工作福利:特休假一年12天、健身房月費補助、不定期員工聚餐、
         多樣化辦公室點心及飲料


公司分紅與獎金:依上季營收狀況，每季分發


公司介紹:
Timeline Technologies was founded in 2016 as an quantitative research and
technology firm.  We are active in several markets in Asia and looking for
experienced DevOps Engineer to join our technology team.  At Timeline
Technologies, our engineers design, build, and improve our core trading
system.  As a key member of the technology team, you will collaborate closely
with other developers, researchers, and traders


人資或徵才聯絡方式:請將您的cv寄到
